20101227030050.000|20101227030052.000|TR0|artist and protege of late funk legend

20101227030525.000|20101227030527.000|TR0|snow.  Reports of it in Manhattan.  A lot 
20101227030527.000|20101227030530.000|TR0|of reports coming in.  I saw that on 
20101227030530.000|20101227030532.000|TR0|Twitter.  People have been talking about 
20101227030532.000|20101227030534.000|TR0|this phenomenon where you have an intense 
20101227030534.000|20101227030537.000|TR0|snowstorm, you get thunder and lightning, 
20101227030537.000|20101227030539.000|TR0|flashes of lightning, just like in a 
20101227030539.000|20101227030542.000|TR0|summer thunderstorm, except it's all

20101227032005.000|20101227032007.000|TR0|telephone):  Well, from Boston to New 
20101227032007.000|20101227032010.000|TR0|York, we cancelled a total of eight trains 
20101227032010.000|20101227032012.000|TR0|between those two end points.  And most of

20101227032027.000|20101227032029.000|TR0|GORANI:  And are some people stranded?  Or 
20101227032029.000|20101227032032.000|TR0|has everyone been able to sort of leave 
20101227032032.000|20101227032034.000|TR0|the terminal or leave the train station 
20101227032034.000|20101227032036.000|TR0|and find someplace else to spend the night?
20101227032036.000|20101227032039.000|TR0|
20101227032039.000|20101227032041.000|TR0|COLE:  Well, what we did was we, you know, 
20101227032041.000|20101227032044.000|TR0|as soon as we figured out that we were not 
20101227032044.000|20101227032046.000|TR0|going to run the trains, we have a system 
20101227032046.000|20101227032048.000|TR0|whereby we contact the passengers through 
20101227032048.000|20101227032051.000|TR0|our reservations department by phone or by 
20101227032051.000|20101227032053.000|TR0|other means electronically to make sure 
20101227032053.000|20101227032056.000|TR0|that they are aware that the train has 
20101227032056.000|20101227032058.000|TR0|been cancelled.  The hope there is that 
20101227032058.000|20101227032101.000|TR0|they don't show up to the station then and 
20101227032101.000|20101227032103.000|TR0|then have to find other ways to get home.
20101227032103.000|20101227032105.000|TR0|

20101227032108.000|20101227032110.000|TR0|far as we see at the stations, a lot of

20101227032113.000|20101227032115.000|TR0|the trains were cancelled because we don't

20101227033132.000|20101227033135.000|TR0|If you are under contract with someone and 
20101227033135.000|20101227033137.000|TR0|they weren't releasing your music or 
20101227033137.000|20101227033140.000|TR0|paying you, this initiative allowed you to

20101227034102.000|20101227034104.000|TR0| The textbooks say the man who murdered 
20101227034104.000|20101227034106.000|TR0|Abraham Lincoln was shot to death by Union 
20101227034106.000|20101227034109.000|TR0|troops 12 days after the assassination.

20101227034111.000|20101227034114.000|TR0|Booth got away with it, killing himself 40 
20101227034114.000|20101227034116.000|TR0|years after he killed the president.

20101227034121.000|20101227034123.000|TR0|body of his brother.  They hope by digging
